item.title: About
item.description: The universe is transformation: life is opinion. - Marcus Aurelius 0x1. Me? When I was young and ignorant, the number Zero fascinated me, because 0 is neither positive nor negative, or both positive and negative in nature at the same time. Almost like Schrödinger’s cat. This quantum nature of being in the rather grey line of the world, seemed interesting enough to name my existence after it. And so, I was born.
